# Flip Courses

> Learn to Flip Cards for Profit

Flip Courses is a video course platform teaching people how to flip Pokemon and Sports cards for profit. The platform offers free beginner courses and premium tiers with advanced strategies, community access, and 1-on-1 coaching.

## Courses

- Pokemon TCG Flipping
- Sports Card Flipping
- Card Grading (PSA, BGS, CGC)
- Sourcing Undervalued Cards
- Pricing Strategy & Fee Calculation
- Market Trend Analysis

## Pricing

- Free: 5 beginner courses, no credit card required
- Pro ($19/mo): All courses, market analysis tools, community access
- Master ($49/mo): Everything in Pro plus 1-on-1 coaching and personalized flip reviews

## Links

- Website: https://flip.courses
- Related: https://flip.ink (Profit Tracker), https://flip.garden, https://sell.party, https://sell.singles
